putWithBackup

void putWithBackup(java.lang.String key,
                   SCDataSpec data,
                   SCGroupSpec groups)
                   throws java.lang.Exception
Only available if the SCMultiManager is being used

Same as put(String, SCDataSpec, SCGroupSpec) - however, the data is written to 2 managed servers for safety. i.e. if the main server fails, the data is still available on the backup.

Parameters:
key - Key
data - data and TTL
groups - groups or null for no groups
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - errors

removeGroup

java.util.List<java.lang.String> removeGroup(SCGroup group)
                                             throws java.lang.Exception
sccache supports associative keys via SCGroup. This method deletes all objects associated with the given group.

Parameters:
group - the group to delete
Returns:
list of keys deleted.
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - errors

sccache supports associative keys via SCGroup. This method returns all object keys associated with the given group.
